Summary: No lights, black triangle, no sound, flew straight path, north to south. WOW!
divs: Sighting DetailsBefore bed I go outside and lay on a lounge chair with binoculars. Look around night sky at stars and satellights for relaxation. I saw one part of the north sky flicker like the stars were disturbed. I put my binoculars in that area and found a B-2 Stealth bomber I thought. I was darker than the background sky so I could easily see the shape. I looked for the telltale zigzag rear cut of the wing but it was straight! Then I noticed it had no lights on, I thought that's illegal. Then I could see six elongated ports glowing a soft grey or bluish color underneath the leading edge of the plane, three on each side. It then sank in that I'm seeing something I'm not supposed to. I got a little scared my breathing quieted and I watched it go across the entire night sky. It came from the angle of Las Vegas heading towards Phoenix in a perfect straight line and never made a sound. I always see jet planes go by at high altitude and you can still hear them and see a condensation trail. This was twice as big in my binoculars and twice as fast as satellights. It was not a perfect triangle, it was slightly wider than long. And the corners were rounded slightly. And there was no sound, that was the weird part, it looked like a toy. Toward the end where I couldn't no longer keep my view of it I found myself saying, " thank you, thank you" which was kind of funny. Like I was thanking them for letting me see them go by. Told my wife and kid but they don't care. But I do, what an honor!! Brian
